text: Bougainville ( ;Archived at Ghostarchive and the Wayback Machine: Tok Pisin: Bogenvil), officially the Autonomous Region of Bougainville (Tok Pisin: Otonomos Region bilong Bogenvil), is an autonomous region in Papua New Guinea. The largest island is Bougainville Island, while the region also includes Buka Island and a number of outlying islands and atolls. The current capital is Buka, situated on Buka Island. This page lists political parties in the Autonomous Region of Bougainville, an autonomous region within Papua New Guinea. The following political parties operate only within Bougainville. ==Parties active only in Bougainville== *Bougainville Independence Movement *Bougainville Labour Party *Bougainville People's Congress *New Bougainville Party *Bougainville Islands Unity Party ==References== Category:Politics of Papua New Guinea Bougainville
title: List of political parties in Bougainville
